name: AMAEYA
tag_list: msp, it-security, mssp, infrastructure, security, disaster-recovery, it-services, cloud-it-services, saas
overview:
AMAEYA is a provider of infrastructure, security and disaster recovery solutions and services that help our customers protect their Availability, Integrity & Confidentiality.

Our flagship product brings together a unique blend of IT services in a clean, beautiful interface, helping customers achieve a real symbiosis between IT and the business. Our services are backed by a 24x7 Network Operations Center that delivers and supports our customers.

AMAEYA and its partners operate across timezones and cover all regions including North America, Europe, the Middle East, India and the Far East.

milestones.description:
Cognito announces launch of Cloud-based Web & Email Security in India.
The availability of the Web & Email Security Services in India is open to both customers and interested providers who wish to partner with Cognito to offer these services to their end
milestones.source_description: Cognito announces launch of Cloud-based Web & Email Security in India.

milestones.description: Cognito, a leading Managed IT Services & Security Provider, and Sonian, the pioneer in cloud-powered archiving and search, today announced their partnership where Cognito will become a major distributor for Sonian's archiving solutions in the middle east.
Cognito launches the first real IT-as-a-Service platform that unifies infrastructure, vulnerability & service delivery management with an innovative framework and beautiful core interface.
